metadata.title: CVE-2018-17825 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in AdPlug 2.3.1. There are several double-freevulnerabilities in the CEmuopl class in emuopl.cpp because of adestructor's two OPLDestroy calls, each of which frees TL_TABLE, SIN_TABLE,AMS_TABLE, and VIB_TABLE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.2.1+dfsg3-1~build0.16.04.1
libadplug-2.2.1-0v5 - 2.2.1+dfsg3-1~build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.1+dfsg3-1~build0.16.04.1').
